Class TranslationModel

java.lang.Object
org.supsi.model.translations.TranslationModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITranslationsModel
public class TranslationModel extends Object implements ITranslationsModel
Represents the model for managing translations and language settings in the application. Utilizes the controllers to retrieve and cache translations and user preferences.
